thread.title: Virtual Press Office Exhibitor Profiles: CEDIA EXPO 2015
thread.title_full: Virtual Press Office Exhibitor Profiles: CEDIA EXPO 2015

author: admin
title: Virtual Press Office Exhibitor Profiles: CEDIA EXPO 2015
text:
Companies mentioned in this article: Virtual Press Office 
NEW YORK, Oct. 12, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- The following event roundup from Virtual Press Office is a list of featured exhibitors for CEDIA EXPO 2015, the global showcase of the future home experience, which takes place from October 14-17 at Kay Bailey Hutchison Convention Center in Dallas, Texas. 
CEDIA EXPO 2015 press kits, news releases and photos are available on the Virtual Press Office/PR Newswire dedicated news page for the CEDIA Event: http://cedia.vporoom.com/ 
CEDIA EXPO 2015 press kits on Virtual Press Office 
Crestron Electronics, Inc. Booth #4100Crestron has been the world's leading manufacturer of advanced control and automation systems. Our solutions are built on a validated architecture, using best-in-class technology that integrates unified communications, AV presentation, lighting, and environmental systems. Crestron streamlines technology, improving the quality of life for people in corporate conference rooms, hotels, classrooms, auditoriums, and in their homes. 
Draper For more information, visit draperinc.com 
Key Digital Booth #2200Key DigitalÂ® is an award winning (CES, InfoComm, CEDIA, NAHB) developer and manufacturer of leading-edge technology for HDTV applications, delivering total video systems solutions. The company manufactures a wide range of digital video processing and video signal distribution solutions as well as control systems marketed broadly to the HDTV community, such as digital video and audio processors, switchers, distribution amplifiers, cables, adapters, and more. For more information, visit our webpage at keydigital.com. 
NEAR, a division of Bogen Communications, Inc. Founded in 1988 NEAR (a division of Bogen Communications, Inc.) specializes in designing ultra-fidelity loudspeakers for outdoor, marine and other challenging environments. NEAR speakers are designed to meet or exceed stringent humidity, salt air, heat, cold, and immersion durability standards, making them totally weather proof not just "weather resistant." 
Salamander Designs For more information, visit salamanderdesigns.com 
Visual Sports Systems Booth #6021For more information, visit visualsports.ca 
The above press kits will continue to be updated throughout the show. Please check back during CEDIA EXPO 2015 for the latest news. 
Virtual Press Office ( http://www.vporoom.com/ ) is a PR Newswire company. Follow us on Twitter @VPOEventZone or subscribe to our RSS feed for more trade show news. If you have questions about Virtual Press Office services, or if you would like to offer feedback on this exhibitor profile roundup, please email sales@vpoinc.com . 
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/virtual-press-office-exhibitor-profiles-cedia-expo-2015-300157563.html
